mapper.select: select od.order_date, pim.origin_name as image_src, pm.pdt_name as name, od.count, pm.pdt_price as price, odm.status from order_dtl od left outer join pdt_mst pm on (od.productId = pm.id) left outer join order_detail_mst odm on (od.status = odm.id) left outer join pdt_image_mst pim on (od.productId = pim.pdt_id) where username = #{username}
